title: MontaiL
author: MontaiL
content: The mobile wallet is the third developed by the team (after the desktop wallet and the browser extension), it marks a significant step in making Alephium more widely accessible and easier to use on the go.A first phase of internal testing has been completed, and the app has gone through initial approval stages on the appstore.We can now invite people to install the app through the official testing platform of Apple, called TestFlight.Find all infos here: https://medium.com/@alephium/ios-mobile-wallet-beta-testing-feedback-wanted-cdf162a49a79 ( Android users, donâ€™t worry, playstore beta is not far behind!)

comments.author: MontaiL
